Verses: 1 aagaiyaal Enna Solluvom? Kirubai Perugumpadikkup Paavaththile Nilainirkalaam Endru Solluvomaa? Koodaadhe.
2 paavaththukku Mariththa Naam Ini Adhile Eppadip Pizhaippom?
3 kiristhu Yesuvukkullaaga Gnaanasnaanam Petra Naamanaivarum Avarudaiya Maranaththukkullaaga, Gnaanasnaanam Petradhai Ariyaamalirukkireergalaa?

4 melum Pidhaavin Magimaiyinaale Kiristhu Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppappattadhupola, Naamum Pudhidhaana Jeevanullavargalaai Nadandhukollumpadikku, Avarudaiya Maranaththirkullaakkum Gnaanasnaanaththinaale Kiristhuvudanekooda Adakkampannappattom.
5 aadhalaal Avarudaiya Maranaththin Saayalil Naam Inaikkappattavargalaanaal, Avar Uyirththezhudhalin Saayalilum Inaikkappattiruppom.
6 naam Inip Paavaththukku Oozhiyanjseyyaadhapadikku, Paavasareeram Ozhindhupokumporuttaaga, Nammudaiya Pazhaiya Manushan Avarodekooda Siluvaiyil Araiyappattadhendru Arindhirukkirom.
7 mariththavan Paavaththukku Neengi Vidudhalaiyaakkappattirukkiraane.
8 aagaiyaal Kiristhuvudanekooda Naam Mariththomaanaal, Avarudanekooda Pizhaiththum Iruppom Endru Nambugirom.
9 mariththorilirundhu Ezhundha Kiristhu Ini Marippadhillaiyendru Arindhirukkirom; Maranam Ini Avarai Aandukolvadhillai.
10 avar Mariththadhu, Paavaththirkendru Oredharam Mariththaar; Avar Pizhaiththirukkiradhu, Dhevanukkendru Pizhaiththirukkiraar.
11 appadiye Neengalum, Ungalai Paavaththirku Mariththavargalaagavum, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiyayesukiristhuvukkul Dhevanukkendru Pizhaiththirukkiravargalaagavum Ennikkollungal.
12 aagaiyaal, Neengal Sareera Ichchaigalinpadi Paavaththirkuk Keezhppadiyaththakkadhaaga, Saavukkedhuvaana Ungal Sareeraththil Paavam Aalaadhiruppadhaaga.

13 neengal Ungal Avayavangalai Aneedhiyin Aayudhangalaagap Paavaththirku Oppukkodaamal, Ungalai Mariththorilirundhu Pizhaiththirukkiravargalaaga Dhevanukku Oppukkoduththu, Ungal Avayavangalai Needhikkuriya Aayudhangalaaga Dhevanukku Oppukkodungal.
14 neengal Niyaayappiramaanaththirkuk Keezhppattiraamal Kirubaikkuk Keezhppattirukkirapadiyaal, Paavam Ungalai Merkollamaattaadhu.
15 idhinaal Enna? Naam Niyaayappiramaanaththirkuk Keezhppattiraamal Kirubaikkuk Keezhppattirukkirapadiyaal Paavanjseyyalaamaa? Koodaadhe.

16 maranaththukkedhuvaana Paavaththukkaanaalum, Needhikkedhuvaana Keezhppadidhalukkaanaalum, Edharkuk Keezhppadiyumpadi Ungalai Adimaigalaaga Oppukkodukkireergalo, Adharke Keezhppadigira Adimaigalaayirukkireergalendru Ariyeergalaa?
17 munne Neengal Paavaththirku Adimaigalaayirundhum, Ippozhudhu Ungalukku Oppuvikkappatta Ubadhesa Sattaththirku Neengal Manappoorvamaaik Keezhppadindhadhinaale Dhevanukku Sthoththiram.
18 paavaththinindru Neengal Vidudhalaiyaakkappattu, Needhikku Adimaigalaaneergal.

19 ungal Maamsa Balaveenaththinimiththam Manushar Pesugira Piragaaramaaip Pesugiren. Akkiramaththai Nadappikkumpadi Munne Neengal Ungal Avayavangalai Asuththaththirkum Akkiramaththirkum Adimaigalaaga Oppukkoduththadhupola, Ippozhudhu Parisuththamaanadhai Nadappikkumpadi Ungal Avayavangalai Needhikku Adimaigalaaga Oppukkodungal.
20 paavaththirku Neengal Adimaigalaayirundha Kaalaththil Needhikku Neenginavargalaayirundheergal.
21 ippozhudhu Ungalukku Vetkamaagath Thondrugira Kaariyangalinaale Akkaalaththil Ungalukku Enna Palan Kidaiththadhu? Avaigalin Mudivu Maraname.
22 ippozhudhu Neengal Paavaththinindru Vidudhalaiyaakkappattu, Dhevanukku Adimaigalaanadhinaal, Parisuththamaakudhal Ungalukkuk Kidaikkum Balan, Mudivo Niththiyajeevan.
23 paavaththin Sambalam Maranam; Dhevanudaiya Kirubaivaramo Nammudaiya Karththaraagiyayesukiristhuvinaal Undaana Niththiyajeevan.
